text: aur misr ke jis vyakti ne use khareeda, usane apanee patnee se kahaah ise aadar-maan se rakho. sambhav hai ye hamen laabh pahunchaaye, athava ham ise apana putr bana len. is prakaar use hamane sthaan diya aur taaki use baaton ka arth sikhaayen aur allaah apana aadesh poora karake rahata hai. parantu adhiktar log jaanate nahin hain
